log.invalidSound: is not a valid audio file, skipping

directory.name: Custom SoundBoard Directory
directory.hint: This should point to a folder containing subfolders, each containing audio files. See modules/SoundBoard/exampleAudio/ for an example

source.name: Source Type
source.hint: If your sounds are stored in your Forge Assets, select Forge. If they are stored in an S3 bucket, select S3. Otherwise, select Data

opacity.name: Defocus Opacity
opacity.hint: Set the opacity of the SoundBoard when you are not hovering over it. 1 to disable.

detune.name: Random Detune Amount
detune.hint: Randomly detune a sound each time it plays. 0 to disable. Backported to 0.7, works best in 0.8.1+

macroRequest.name: Players trigger SoundBoard macros
macroRequest.hint: Enable this to allow players to trigger a sound using a macro with playSoundByName. Requires a connected GM.

popoutCompat.name: Force PopOut! Compatibility
popoutCompat.hint: Override some PopOut! code to force compatibility. Note that this may reduce performance while the SoundBoard is popped out. Changing this setting will refresh your browser.

app.title: My Sounds - SoundBoard by Blitz
app.instructions: Left click a sound button to broadcast it to all players, right click to preview a sound for the GM only. Click the 3 dots to open options for Favoriting and Looping sounds. Click a looping sound to stop it after the current loop. Click Stop to stop all sounds immediately.
app.instructionsExtended: Click 'Stop All' to end all currently playing sounds
app.noBundledSoundsDesc: Install Sound Packs and activate them via the SoundBoard Package Manager
app.exampleWarning: You have not changed the SoundBoard directory from exampleAudio. If you have added files there, they will be deleted when the module updates. Click the Help button at the top right for more information on Custom Audio.

toolbar.target: Send sounds to a specific player only

packman.title: SoundBoard Package Manager
packman.installedPacksDesc: Click to activate or deactivate an installed pack
packman.noPacksDesc: You can install the Blitz Free and Community packs by searching the module browser for 'SoundBoard Pack'

notif.soundsNotLoaded: Sounds are still loading, please try again shortly
notif.soundsError: Error loading sounds. Check your path in module settings
notif.interfaceMuted: Please un-mute your interface volume to hear SoundBoard audio

default.title: SoundBoard Default
default.description: The default theme for SoundBoard, customisable through Whetstone

loopbgto.title: Active Loop Background End Color
loopbgto.hint: Animates between Start and End colors

loopactiveiconcolor.title: Active Loop Icon Color
loopactiveiconcolor.hint: Color for the looping icon in extended options

looptextcolor.title: Active Loop Text Color
looptextcolor.hint: Button text color for actively looping item

favoritecolor.title: Favorites Color
favoritecolor.hint: Changes the favorite star color, and button border color

morebuttonactive.title: More Button Active
morebuttonactive.hint: Color of the three-dot More button when a sound button is moused over

morebuttoninactive.title: More Button Inactive
morebuttoninactive.hint: Color of the three-dot More button when a sound button is not moused over

morebuttonhover.title: More Button Hover
morebuttonhover.hint: Color of the three-dot More button when the three-dot button is hovered over

extendedoptionsbg.title: Extended Options Background
extendedoptionsbg.hint: Color of the layout seen when the three-dot More button is clicked

extendedoptionsicon.title: Extended Options Icons
extendedoptionsicon.hint: Color of the favorite, loop and delay icons when they are not active

volumetextcolor.title: Volume Text Color
volumetextcolor.hint: Color of the Volume label at the bottom of the SoundBoard

toolbarcolor.title: Toolbar/Container Color
toolbarcolor.hint: Color of the toolbar, volume container and header bar

toolbarbtnactivecolor.title: Active Toolbar Button Color
toolbarbtnactivecolor.hint: Color of a currently active toolbar button (eg. Target Player is selected)
